title: One Last Joyride: Should Geraint Thomas Return to the Classics before He Retires?
content:
Thomas is hinting at a return to one-day racing before retirement, but would it rob him his competitiveness at grand tours? And does it even matter?

Read the full article at One Last Joyride: Should Geraint Thomas Return to the Classics before He Retires? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
